name: Sugu Suro Duo: New Pulsar R&V
overview: From the popular pachislot machine "New Pulsar" series which shipped the series total of 400,000 units (as of January 2009), "New Pulsar R" and "New Pulsar V" are simultaneously recorded. Play motion of pachislot is fully reproduced with Wii remote control! In the simulation mode, not only the capture functions such as "auto play" and "slump graph", but also contents of fulfilling contents containing many functions for pachislo beginners such as "model information", "establishment flag (role)" "missing" I will.
